column4: my firefox 3.5 takes a long time to startup, anyone else experiencing this?  i have disabled all my addons and still having the same problem.
maybe a corrupted profile? try loading firefox with a fresh one
try in a terminal. i hope it works in ffox 3.5:  firefox -profilemanager
created a new profile, still the same issue.  there is a lot of disk activity on startup.
FF also goes dimmed for a while...
maybe a compiz plugin is slowing ffox down for some reason
which one I don't know, though.
that's strange, i only use cube and grid...  no problem in the past.
alright. when did your problem start? do you remember?
only recently...  does doing hugday init on the profile got anything to do with it perhaps?
ah i just reset everything using safe-mode and it seems ok now, thanks.
